p: Once the GHG emissions from the production of food included in ENAPREF were computed for each city, these were added to the estimation of GHG emissions related to FAFH and those linked to the regional distribution of food up to the city of consumption, as shown in Fig 1. In total 25 geographical scenarios were computed with all the stages. The scenario for the Peruvian average diet only included the quantification of production of food, without considering regional distribution to the wholesaler. Finally, socioeconomic scenarios only included the production of food consumed in the household.
